title: game crashes during loading screen and requires me to repair client over and over again.
body: lol crashes during loading screen requiring me to repair client and reinstall patch. this wouldn't be to much of a hassle if, i wasn't required to do this every 2 to 3 days. to my knowledge the only difference on my computer is this patch 9.8. any assistance would be appreciated. super disappointing when you are about to tear up the rift and the game crashes.

replies.body: It crashed multiple times which makes me reset the pc and got low ass trust factor, can anybody help me resolve it? Tks
diagnostic tool cant find any problems and ive run the repair tool like 5 times in the past week. swear to god this happens every 3 to 4 patches.

Sorry to hear that.  I would start with writing into Player Support.  Our Tech guys will be able to look into this and help determine what is causing the issue.  If they can't help, then it may be a problem on our end that we will need to look into.  You can also[ start here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to diagnose the problem yourself.  

I know this is annoying, but I hope this helps.
